data.eml:eml: Redescription of the poorly known crab spider Xysticus spasskyi (Araneae: Thomisidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marusik, Yuri M., Azarkina, Galina N. (2016): Redescription of the poorly known crab spider Xysticus spasskyi (Araneae: Thomisidae). Zootaxa 4161 (4): 561-566, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4161.4.7
